suite.name: Headers Params Auth

kw.name: Conectar com autenticação básica na API do GitHub
Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mygithubAuth, url=https://api.github.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=<requests.auth.HTTPBasicAuth object at 0x000001F9EB37EDC0>, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Solicitar os dados do meu usuário
Get On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://api.github.com/user path_url=/user headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Authorization': 'Basic dnBhY2hlY29vbzowYTM3NmFhYmM4YjVkNWQ3Mjc1ZmQzNDkzNDNiYzE0Nzk4Yjg2ZmJm'} body=None

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
